name: Social Share & Like for WooCommerce
author: Md Rashed Hossain

sections.description:
If you want to people can tweet your products on twitter, share your products on facebook and like your products using facebook. This plugin is providing all the feature. You don’t need to configure anything and you don’t need any API.

Features
* Customers can share your products on Facebook
* Customers can like your products using Facebook
* Customers can tweet your products on twitter

N.B: If you want more options in this plugin, please contact with us

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WP Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload hcap.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates

short_description: This plugin will help you to tweet your products on twitter and share products on facebook
